Plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.
Title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
Actors: Hugh Grant, James Fleet, Simon Callow, John Hannah
tomatoConsensus: While frothy to a fault, Four Weddings and a Funeral features irresistibly breezy humor, and winsome performances from Hugh Grant and Andie MacDowell.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 20 nominations.
